binary_sensor.description: If "all entities" is enabled, the group's state is on only if all members are on. If "all entities" is disabled, the group's state is on if any member is on.
binary_sensor.title: Add Group

data.name: Name
data.round_digits: Round value to number of decimals

user.description: Groups allow you to create a new entity that represents multiple entities of the same type.
user.title: Add Group

device_classes_not_matching.description:
Device classes `{device_classes}` on source entities `{source_entities}` needs to be same for sensor group `{entity_id}`.

Please correct the device classes on the source entities and reload the group sensor to fix this issue.
device_classes_not_matching.title: Device classes is not correct

state_classes_not_matching.description:
State classes `{state_classes}` on source entities `{source_entities}` needs to be same for sensor group `{entity_id}`.

Please correct the state classes on the source entities and reload the group sensor to fix this issue.
state_classes_not_matching.title: State classes is not correct

uoms_not_matching_device_class.description:
Unit of measurements `{uoms}` of input sensors `{source_entities}` are not compatible and can't be converted with the device class `{device_class}` of sensor group `{entity_id}`.

Please correct the unit of measurements on the source entities and reload the group sensor to fix this issue.
uoms_not_matching_device_class.title: Unit of measurements are not correct

uoms_not_matching_no_device_class.description:
Unit of measurements `{uoms}` of input sensors `{source_entities}` are not compatible when not using a device class on sensor group `{entity_id}`.

Please correct the unit of measurements on the source entities or set a proper device class on the sensor group and reload the group sensor to fix this issue.
uoms_not_matching_no_device_class.title: Unit of measurements is not correct

binary_sensor.description: If "all entities" is enabled, the group's state is on only if all members are on. If "all entities" is disabled, the group's state is on if any member is on.

light.description: If "all entities" is enabled, the group's state is on only if all members are on. If "all entities" is disabled, the group's state is on if any member is on.

data.round_digits: Round value to number of decimals

sensor.description: If "ignore non-numeric" is enabled, the group's state is calculated if at least one member has a numerical value. If "ignore non-numeric" is disabled, the group's state is calculated only if all group members have numerical values.

switch.description: If "all entities" is enabled, the group's state is on only if all members are on. If "all entities" is disabled, the group's state is on if any member is on.

reload.description: Reloads group configuration, entities, and notify services from YAML-configuration.
reload.name: Reload

object_id.description: Object ID of this group. This object ID is used as part of the entity ID. Entity ID format: [domain].[object_id].
object_id.name: Object ID

add_entities.description: List of members to be added to the group. Cannot be used in combination with `Entities` or `Remove entities`.
add_entities.name: Add entities

all.description: Enable this option if the group should only be used when all entities are in state `on`.
all.name: All

entities.description: List of all members in the group. Cannot be used in combination with `Add entities` or `Remove entities`.
entities.name: Entities

icon.description: Name of the icon for the group.
icon.name: Icon

object_id.description: Object ID of this group. This object ID is used as part of the entity ID. Entity ID format: [domain].[object_id].
object_id.name: Object ID

remove_entities.description: List of members to be removed from a group. Cannot be used in combination with `Entities` or `Add entities`.
remove_entities.name: Remove entities
